wikipedia_page.main: John Grosvenor Beevor (1 January 1845 – 5 May 1903) was an English first-class cricketer active 1868–71 who played for Nottinghamshire. He was born and died in Barnby Moor.The son of Henry Beevor of Retford, he was educated at Uppingham School from 1857 to 1862. He then had a career as a solicitor.
